name: Vintage Natural Face Cream For Oily Skin 50g
description:
Our natural face cream for oily skin combines heavenly organic coconut oil with the healing waxy properties of Organic Jojoba Oil to create a light heavenly organic face cream that melts into the skin. Our face cream is whisked gently with Organic Shea Butter to add that special touch of emollient butter to moisturise your face. We use completely natural emulsifiers from the Vegan Danish ice-cream industry to create a unique product where the oil melts into the skin instead of leaving a greasy film on the surface of your face. Our cream really is a stripped back naked product where the quality of the ingredients help oily or spotty skin. The 50g Face Cream comes in an Epoxy Lined Aluminum tin which keep the contents completely fresh. The lightweight tin is a perfect size for popping in your handbag or make up bag so it is always close at hand Love your skin by nourishing it with our heavenly face cream. Natural Cosmetics Creams made the old fashioned way.

Natural Face Cream For Oily Skin Features

Mild organic formula great for even the most sensitive of skin Emollient properties of Organic Natural Shea Butter No SLS/SLES and no Parabens Vegan friendly edible emulsifier Jojoba oil is perfect for greasy or spotty skin 70% Organic Ingredients and 100% Natural Natural Greenest Preservative available on the market

Ingredients

To find out more about the following list of ingredients, please check our descriptions under ‘Our Ingredients’ in the menu. Aqua (Water) Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil* Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)* Simmondsia, Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil* Glycerin Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate Glyceryl Stearate Cetyl Alcohol Tocopherol(Vitamin E Natural) Preservative 12 * Denotes Organic Ingredient
